channel.title: Comments on: Improving my home office setup

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@2 - Couldn't agree more, I just can't quite justify a new monitor at the moment. If IdeaJam goes well this year then maybe a Christmas present to myself <img alt="Emoticon" src="<a rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif"</a> /></p>
item.content:encoded: @2 – Couldn’t agree more, I just can’t quite justify a new monitor at the moment. If IdeaJam goes well this year then maybe a Christmas present to myself http://www.11tmr.com/11tmr.nsf/emoticons/DLYH-5MZVLY/$File/smile.gif“ />

item.title: By: Bruce
item.dc:creator: Bruce
item.description: <p>Great view Matt! I would love to live in the city.</p>
item.content:encoded: Great view Matt! I would love to live in the city.

item.title: By: sean cull
item.dc:creator: sean cull
item.description: <p>Hi Matt, I find 2 full screens are really useful and help my productivity a lot<br /><br />I struggled to do this with laptops until I discovered USB DVI enabled hubs<br /><br />{ <a href="<a rel="nofollow" href="http://www.seancull.co.uk/Public/seancull.nsf/dx/toshiba-dynadock-usb-docking-station-with-dvi-out.htm?opendocument"" rel="nofollow ugc">http://www.seancull.co.uk/Public/seancull.nsf/dx/toshiba-dynadock-usb-docking-station-with-dvi-out.htm?opendocument"</a> rel="nofollow" target ="blank">Link</a> }</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Matt, I find 2 full screens are really useful and help my productivity a lot

I struggled to do this with laptops until I discovered USB DVI enabled hubs

{ http://www.seancull.co.uk/Public/seancull.nsf/dx/toshiba-dynadock-usb-docking-station-with-dvi-out.htm?opendocument“ rel=”nofollow” target =”blank”>Link }
